entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 6.
